passage.title: The first day of school
passage.paragraph: It is the first day of school. Sam wants to go back to school. He wants to see his friends. He wants to meet his new teachers.
He gets up early in the morning. He washes and has breakfast. Then he goes to school by bus.
He sees his many friends in school. He plays football with them. Then the bell rings, everyone runs to the classroom.
Sam meets his new teacher. Her name is Lin Hua. She teaches them Chinese this term. Sam likes Miss Lin. He thinks she is a good teacher.
